    HeartbeatManager - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Network
    The HeartbeatManager is responsible for managing and monitoring client heartbeats to detect timeouts and handle client disconnects.
    HeartbeatManager(long, HeartbeatManager.HeartbeatDisconnectHandler) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Network.HeartbeatManager
    Constructs a HeartbeatManager instance responsible for managing client heartbeats and detecting timeouts.
    HeartbeatManager.HeartbeatDisconnectHandler - Interface in it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Network
    The HeartbeatDisconnectHandler interface defines a contract for handling disconnection events in a system that monitors client activity through heartbeat signals.

    Hourglass - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Model.Miscellaneous
    The Hourglass class represents a countdown timer that decrements every second and allows actions to be executed upon completion using a callback method.
